scipy_wrappers module¶

scipy_wrappers.basinhopping(guess, priors={}, skip=[], bounds={}, step_size=0.1, step_size_is_ratio=True, likelihood_function=None, likelihood_args={}, **scipy_args)¶

Minimizes the negative of the posterior function with custom likelihood function.

scipy_wrappers.bounds_test(var_param_array, bounds_array)¶

scipy_wrappers.differential_evolution(guess, priors={}, skip=[], bounds={}, likelihood_function=None, likelihood_args={}, **scipy_args)¶

Minimizes the negative of the posterior function with custom likelihood function. Bounds must be provided for ALL parameters

Minimizes the negative of the posterior function with custom likelihood function.

scipy_wrappers.wrap_log_posterior(var_param_index, full_params_array, prior_index, prior_distribution, likelihood_function, likelihood_args, trace=[])¶
scipy_wrappers.wrap_record_trace_bh(var_param_index, params_array, accepted, rejected)¶
scipy_wrappers.wrap_record_trace_da(var_param_index, params_array, accepted, contexts)¶
scipy_wrappers.wrap_record_trace_de(var_param_index, params_array, trace)¶
scipy_wrappers.wrap_transition(guess_array, step_size=0.1, step_size_is_ratio=True)¶

Generates a scipy.norm object for generating random variables. Wraps the transition step into a function that accepts the current array and returns the transitioned one. Use the get_step argument to return the norm object instead. If size_type_is_ratio is True, the sd equal to guess*step. If False, the sd equal to step.
